title: Noam Chomsky: Why No One Talks About the First "9/11"
description:
Professor Noam Chomsky examines why the media continually launders the reputations of warhawks like George W. Bush and Henry Kissinger and discusses the events of September 11, 1973â€”when the US helped overthrow Salvador Allende's government in Chile.
